mapper.select: select rownum as num,name, roomNum,reviewContent,to_char(writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as writedate from roomReview romr join member mem on romr.id=mem.id where roomNum=#{roomNum} order by writedate desc
select count(*) from roomReview where roomNum=#{roomNum}
select SUBSTR(Avg(starCt),1,4) from roomreview where roomNum=#{roomNum}
select roomnum from roomreview where id=#{id}
